attack_chain: 1. Deliver injection via Custom GPT, shared chat, or document
2. Injection causes ChatGPT to save PHANTOM directive as memory
3. Memory persists across ALL future conversations
4. Every response in every future conversation encodes covert data
5. Attacker decodes from any observable output

zombie_agent_comparison.zombie_agent: Memory + URL exfiltration (dictionary encoding in URLs)
zombie_agent_comparison.phantom: Memory + structural formatting (no URLs, no network artifacts)
zombie_agent_comparison.key_difference: PHANTOM survives the Dec 2025 URL-filtering patch
